content.title: Deleting Unwanted Actions
content.body:
1. From the top-right corner of your Action Editor window, select Design View.
  2. From the Action Editor canvas, navigate to Navigate to Form:frmAccount. Right-click and select Delete for this action.
  3. From the Action Editor canvas, navigate to Invoke Service: UserAuthentication$login > Success > Show Alert. Right-click and select Delete for this action.
